Link yang berguna

Kumpulan link yang berguna untuk pelajaran:

  1. Intro to CS

    1. https://introtcs.org/public/index.html

  2. Theory of Computation

    1. https://cs-people.bu.edu/sofya/cs332/

    2. https://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~fstephan/theoryofcomputation.html

    3. https://cs-people.bu.edu/mbun/courses/332_S20/

    4. https://www.cs.rochester.edu/u/nelson/courses/csc_173/

  3. Algorithm

    1. https://cp-algorithms.com/

  4. Computer Systems

    1. https://cs0330-fall21.github.io/

  5. Cryptography

    1. https://infosecwriteups.com/breaking-down-sha-1-algorithm-c152ed353de2

    2. https://mit6875.github.io/

  6. Data Compression

    1. http://mattmahoney.net/dc/dce.html

  7. Information and Coding Theory

    1. https://people.montefiore.uliege.be/lwh/Info/

  8. Database

    1. https://sqlbolt.com/

    2. https://www.cs.usfca.edu/~ejung/courses/333/syllabus.html

  9. Metaprogramming

    1. https://lexi-lambda.github.io/blog/2021/03/25/an-introduction-to-typeclass-metaprogramming/

  10. CTF

    1. https://ctf101.org/

    2. https://jaimelightfoot.com/blog/so-you-want-to-ctf-a-beginners-guide/

    3. https://ctf101.org/forensics/what-are-file-formats/

  11. CP

    1. https://www.dcc.fc.up.pt/~pribeiro/aulas/pc1920/awesome/index.html#awesome-reference-materials

  12. FP

    1. https://kongkowitmedan.github.io/kulgram-16-9-2017-monad-intro/kulgram.html

  13. Security

    1. http://www.ilmuhacking.com/

  14. OOP

    1. https://abdullahsurati.github.io/bscit/oop.html

    2. http://danmoser.github.io/notes/index.html

    3. https://choimon.github.io/software/oop/

    4. https://redi-school.github.io/intermediate-java/introduction/

  15. Others

    1. https://web.eecs.umich.edu/~cpeikert/

    2. https://www.wilfred.me.uk/

    3. http://stepanovpapers.com/

    4. https://martin.ankerl.com/2007/10/04/optimized-pow-approximation-for-java-and-c-c/

    5. https://gendignoux.com/

    6. https://beegass.dev/

    7. https://uva-cs.github.io/pdr/tutorials/index.html

    8. http://jamesmcm.github.io/blog/2020/07/25/intro-dod/

    9. https://pabloinsente.github.io/

    10. https://blog.regehr.org/

    11. http://aalhour.com/awesome-compilers/

    12. https://www.slideshare.net/olvemaudal/deep-c

    13. http://programming-motherfucker.com/

    14. https://dev.to/vaidehijoshi/a-gentle-introduction-to-graph-theory

    15. https://0xax.gitbooks.io/linux-insides/content/Booting/linux-bootstrap-1.html

    16. https://www.wikiwand.com/en/List_of_algorithms

    17. https://arjunsreedharan.org/post/82710718100/kernel-101-lets-write-a-kernel

    18. https://sourcemaking.com/

    19. https://matt.might.net/articles/what-cs-majors-should-know/
